enb_long_title: Informal Exchange of Views and Information on Compliance Under the Kyoto Protocol
section_title: A BRIEF HISTORY OF THE FCCC AND THE KYOTO PROTOCOL
sentences: The United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change was adopted on 9 May 1992, and was opened for signature at the UN Conference on Environment and Development in June 1992.
The Convention entered into force on 21 March 1994, 90 days after receipt of the 50th ratification.
It has currently been ratified by 179 countries.
